title: Even Hotter Passion!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>It’s hot.... It’s so hot I can’t do anything....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Nico-san.... Ruby knows what we can do even in this heat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>The school idol DVD marathon! Ruby heard from Hanamaru-chan. She said you’re making another one....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You did!? Geez, Hanamaru~! It was going to be a surprise!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Nico-san, please....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh? What is it all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Let me help you make the school idol DVD marathon 2!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You really, really are something else! Sure, follow my lead~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Okay, Nico-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
